channel.title: Michael Green / @andmichaelgreen
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @andmichaelgreen. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title: R to @baddestmamajama: Starting points after it happened *with fair warning* is both shocking and expected.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description: Starting points after it happened *with fair warning* is both shocking and expected.

item.title: R to @d_haggar: Oh I just tweeted it. It’s still up. It is boring!
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description: Oh I just tweeted it. It’s still up. It is boring!

item.title: It is more shocking that a week later we have still not heard a coherent action plan from Democrats for how to restore Roe than that the Republicans destroyed it.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description: It is more shocking that a week later we have still not heard a coherent action plan from Democrats for how to restore Roe than that the Republicans destroyed it.

item.title: An irreplaceable thrill of seeing a movie in a theater is not knowing how much longer there is left in the experience.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description: An irreplaceable thrill of seeing a movie in a theater is not knowing how much longer there is left in the experience.

item.title: R to @BrooseMiller: As incompetent as he is weak. Still shocking so many career monsters buckled under threat of his silly silly temper.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description: As incompetent as he is weak. Still shocking so many career monsters buckled under threat of his silly silly temper.

item.title: Trump did everything he could to get elected leaders killed on January 6th. A sociopath aspiring to be a murderer.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description: Trump did everything he could to get elected leaders killed on January 6th. A sociopath aspiring to be a murderer.

item.title: R to @dprzygoda: Good point. Deleted.

item.title: R to @NoahHarald: Ah... the Cruz order...
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description: Ah... the Cruz order...

item.title: I think we can all agree that the justices who repealed Roe don’t eat clean food in a restaurant until the right to a safe and legal abortion is restored.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description: I think we can all agree that the justices who repealed Roe don’t eat clean food in a restaurant until the right to a safe and legal abortion is restored.

item.title: We protect the filibuster more than we protect women.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description: We protect the filibuster more than we protect women.

item.title: R to @andmichaelgreen: Doing right is *always* an option.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description: Doing right is *always* an option.

item.title: PSA: You have no moral obligation to follow an immoral law set by an immoral authority.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description: PSA: You have no moral obligation to follow an immoral law set by an immoral authority.

item.title: Whether they know it or not, every Republican voter is furthering Steve Bannon's public goal of burning this country to the ground.

item.title: You can now do this at the 50 yard line of a school sponsored football game according to... <checks notes>... Clarence Thomas.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen

item.title: While I do not support violence today it is 100% ok to pray for Clarence Thomas’ death.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description: While I do not support violence today it is 100% ok to pray for Clarence Thomas’ death.

item.title:
Hats off to companies offering to pay travel for employees and their families who need to go out of state for a safe/legal abolition.
Now how about offering that same amount to any employee who wants to move to another state where their health care is protected?
Fund an exodus.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description:
Hats off to companies offering to pay travel for employees and their families who need to go out of state for a safe/legal abolition.

Now how about offering that same amount to any employee who wants to move to another state where their health care is protected?

Fund an exodus.

item.title: Taking a break from tweeting because every time I open this app I want to encourage violence and some part of me knows that’s wrong.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description: Taking a break from tweeting because every time I open this app I want to encourage violence and some part of me knows that’s wrong.

item.title:
R to @andmichaelgreen: Trump voters made this happen.
Democrats in power let this happen.
Step up or step aside.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description:
Trump voters made this happen.

Democrats in power let this happen.

Step up or step aside.

item.title:
R to @andmichaelgreen: Yes. This is an ultimatum.
Our leaders must become the solution or they will be held accountable as accessories.
item.dc:creator: @andmichaelgreen
item.description:
Yes. This is an ultimatum.

Our leaders must become the solution or they will be held accountable as accessories.
